text: just had a client request support for ie9+… there is _almost_ not enough money in the world to make me willing lol
chromium edge should solve most of our woes with IE
lol if IE display graphic, nothing else
Nope, Q3 of 2019 so within a month and a halfish
the developer and beta builds are already available and work fine.

chromium edge will bring with it an internet explorer compatibility feature, that essentially makes it so for big companies that have specific old intranet apps that don’t play well with modern browsers IT people can set those specific sites to use the IE mode. Users will still be in the same browser but will have their rendering engine downgraded and supports for legacy things like activex and all that will be available.

From the IT perspective it’s a no-brainer to upgrade. No loss of access to legacy apps, and dramatically improved security and performance
Dude, thank you for that! How did that go under my radar? Nice!
lol probably because “IE update grumble grumble grumble, rebrand edge, works better, grumble grumble, outdated grumble grumble chromium” you start to tune out after they dissapoint you once lol
